headline: Zebra Technologies to Present at the Citi Global Industrial Tech & Mobility Conference
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., February 10, 2026--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating workflows to deliver intelligent operations, today announced that the company will present at the Citi Global Industrial Tech & Mobility Conference in Miami, on Tues., Feb. 17 at 8:00 a.m. U.S. eastern time.
